item.title: WWE 2K26 Ratings Revealed: Top 10 Men and Women Ranked
item.content:encoded:
WWE 2K26 features a stacked roster of top names from professional wrestling history. The Superstar overalls reflect that, as there are more than a dozen names who are rated over 90.

There was a ratings reveal on ESPN2 as part of the hype for the upcoming WWE Elimination Chamber event, and now we know the top 10 men and women in the game, all of whom exceed a rating of 90.

WWE 2K26’s Top 10 Rated Men

The men’s side of the top-ranked wrestlers in WWE 2K26 is interesting. Many of the names are just different variants of top wrestlers. There are plenty of wrestlers who take up multiple roster slots in modern WWE games, as each slot represents a different era of their career.

The top 10-rated men’s WWE Superstars feature 3 with a rating of 97, and they’re three of the top names in WWE history: Steve Austin, Roman Reigns ’22, and John Cena. Check out the full top 10 below:

  • “Stone Cold” Steve Austin: 97
  • Roman Reigns ’22: 97
  • John Cena: 97
  • John Cena ’12: 96
  • The Rock ’01: 96
  • The Undertaker: 96
  • “Stone Cold” Steve Austin ’00: 95
  • The Rock: 95
  • Cody Rhodes: 95
  • Roman Reigns: 95

WWE 2K26’s Top 10 Rated Women

The modern-day women’s roster in WWE is as stacked as it’s ever been. Names like Becky Lynch, Rhea Ripley, IYO SKY, Liv Morgan, and Charlotte Flair continue to redefine women’s wrestling.

Their respective ratings in this year’s video game reflect that, and Ripley is one of the only names who would make a top 10 overall list. Check out the full top 10 below:

  • Rhea Ripley: 96
  • Becky Lynch: 94
  • Bianca Belair: 94
  • Charlotte Flair: 93
  • IYO SKY: 93
  • Naomi: 92
  • Stephanie Vaquer: 92
  • Liv Morgan: 92
  • AJ Lee ’15: 92
  • Tiffany Stratton: 91

Another name rated was Grammy award-winning artist Jelly Roll. Check out his Superstar overall here.

Are you excited for WWE 2K26? Sound off in our official Discord server. For more WWE 2K26, learn about the changes coming to the game for Nintendo Switch 2. Also, don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Bluepoint Pitched Bloodborne Remake Before Shutdown
item.content:encoded:
Bluepoint Studio was recently shut down by Sony. A new report sheds some light on the studio’s closure, including the desire to remake Bloodborne and why that didn’t come to fruition.

The new report comes from Jason Schreier of Bloomberg. It was noted that following the cancellation of the live-service God of War game in January 2025, Sony was working closely with the studio to determine their next project. Also in early 2025, there was a pitch to remake Bloodborne. However, while they were told the numbers made sense, people familiar with the situation stated that FromSoftware didn’t want it to happen.

Bluepoint Studio Pitched Other Ideas

The report also notes that Bluepoint pitched other PlayStation studios on developing new projects. One idea was a Ghost of Tsushima spinoff, but it was not approved. Other studios were said to be wary of allocating substantial resources to another team’s project, according to sources familiar with the situation.

It was also noted that when the God of War remake trilogy was announced without Bluepoint involved, some within the studio grew uneasy. One week later, it was announced that the studio was being shut down.

2026 is a big year of shakeups in the gaming industry. Click here to learn about the recent changes at Xbox, including the retirement of Phil Spencer.

How do you feel about the news that Bluepoint wanted to remake Bloodborne? What do you think about the studio’s closure? Sound off in our official Discord server. Also, don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Jelly Roll Is Playable in WWE 2K26
item.content:encoded:
Jelly Roll is playable in WWE 2K26. The Grammy Award-winning country star is rated 80 overall. His rating was revealed as part of ESPN’s Ratings Reveal for the game.

Jelly Roll has been featured on WWE programming multiple times. At WWE SummerSlam 2025, he teamed with Randy Orton in a losing effort against Drew McIntyre and Logan Paul. Now, Roll can get his win back in the virtual squared circle for WWE 2K26.

Jelly Roll Isn’t Featured on WWE 2K26’s Soundtrack

Earlier today, WWE Games revealed the full soundtrack for WWE 2K26. Jelly Roll is not featured on that soundtrack. Rather, this year’s tracks are heavy in the world of Rock. Linkin Park, Bad Omens, Turnstile, and Andrew WK got the nod instead. Check out the full soundtrack here.

Contemporary music artists in WWE games are not a new phenomenon. All the way back in the year 2001, Fred Durst of Limp Bizkit was featured in two WWE games: WWF Raw on the original Xbox and WWF SmackDown!: Just Bring It on the PlayStation 2. Other celebrities who have made it into WWE games include Tyrese Haliburton, Pat McAfee, Mr. T, and more.

Are you excited to play with or against Jelly Roll on WWE 2K26? Sound off in our official Discord server. Also, don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Today’s Wordle #1715: Hints and Answer for February 28, 2026
item.content:encoded:
Wordle challenges players to guess a fresh five-letter word each day in six tries or fewer. Whether you’re a beginner or a daily player, today’s tips and strategies can help you solve it faster and maintain your streak—if you’re open to a little extra help. So, if you’ve found yourself stuck with today’s Wordle, don’t worry, below you’ll find some helpful hints and even the answer for Wordle Game #1715 for February 28, 2026

To play today’s Wordle, head to the game’s website. If you want to go right to today’s answer without any tips or tricks, you can click right here.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today’s and yesterday’s editions of Wordle. If you don’t want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How To Play Wordle

Wordle is a simple but addictive word puzzle. Each day, players have to guess a five-letter word answer in no more than six attempts. After each guess:

  • Green letters are correct and in the right position.
  • Yellow letters are correct, but in the wrong position.
  • Gray letters are not in the word at all.

The goal is to guess the word in as few tries as possible. Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a popular online trend.

Wordle can only be played on the New York Times website. There is currently no app for you to download the official game.

Wordle Hints For Today, February 28, 2026

The Wordle answer for game #1715 is another hard puzzle. According to the NY Times Wordle review, today’s answer takes an average of 5.3 out of 6 guesses. That makes it ever-so-slightly harder than the 5.2-guess average from February 27.

General Wordle Hints For February 28

Without giving today’s Wordle answer completely away, here are a few helpful hints for today to get you started:

  • Hint 1: This word refers to a specific creature, not a general category.
  • Hint 2: It’s most often encountered in mythological or symbolic contexts.
  • Hint 3: The thing it names is known more for its distinct traits than its appearance.
  • Hint 4: You’re more likely to see this word in stories or references than in everyday conversation.

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Wordle #1715 for February 28, 2026.

Starter Words For February 28, 2026

If you want help getting started without having today’s Wordle answer given to you, there are a few starter words worth trying that will help you figure out some included letters. A few starter words that may help are:

  • RADAR
  • DRAMA
  • HARDY
  • HYENA

Today’s Wordle Answer For Game #1715 On February 28, 2026

If you’ve tried everything, including using the above hints, and are still stuck, you can find the answer to today’s Wordle below.

Answer: HYDRA

If you solved today’s Wordle without our answer, congratulations! If not, take note of the best tips above for tomorrow’s puzzle, and check back daily for more hints.

What Does Today’s Wordle Answer Mean?

HYDRA is a noun that describes, from classical mythology, “a water or marsh serpent with nine heads, each of which, if cut off, grew back as two; Hercules killed this serpent by cauterizing the necks as he cut off the heads.”

Outside of mythology, it also means “any freshwater polyp of the genus Hydra and related genera, having a cylindrical body with a ring of tentacles surrounding the mouth, and usually living attached to rocks, plants, etc., but also capable of detaching and floating in the water.”

Yesterday’s Wordle Answer

If you missed the previous game, here’s yesterday’s Wordle answer for Game #1714 on February 27, 2026

Answer: DIZZY

While not always the case, looking at previous words can sometimes give you insight into common patterns or letter usage in Wordle puzzles.

When Is The Next Wordle Game After #1715?

Wordle games are updated daily at 12 am or Midnight in your respective time zone. Information about the next game is often available in the hours before to give players a heads up. The game on March 1 will be Wordle Game #1716.

What Is Wordle?

Wordle is a daily word puzzle created by Josh Wardle. Initially developed as a prototype in 2013, it wasn’t fully released until 2021. The game challenges players to guess a five-letter word in six tries or fewer, using hints from each attempt to narrow down the answer. Its straightforward concept, accessibility, and the thrill of solving a new puzzle each day helped it surge in popularity by late 2021. The success of Wordle inspired numerous spin-offs and social media challenges, leading to its acquisition by The New York Times in early 2022.

For even more Insider Gaming delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our weekly newsletter

Mike has been covering the gaming industry since 2012, and has reported on some of the largest events in the industry while also working as an investigative reporter. Outside of…
